blog.name: phandomreversebang
blog.title: Phandom Reverse Bang 2019
blog.description:
Welcome to the 4th edition of the Phandom Reverse Bang! We're a big bang in reverse; artists create themed pieces of art, and authors claim said work to write a fic based around them! 
  Mobile Navigation

body:
🚨Second Claiming Wave Is Open! 🚨

Hello everyone! 

If you signed up for more than one fic, you may now claim your second fic on this sheet! 

Don’t forget to also claim your second beta as well!

We still have a good portion of spots left so if you didn’t sign up for a second claim and want to, contact us and we’ll let you know if you can! 

Also, if you still have not claimed your first fic or beta yet, please do so! And remember, first claims take over second claims so if you are a first claim and claim a spot where a second claim is, you will get that spot! If this comes up (it never has) then we’ll fix it accordingly! 

If you’re confused, you can visit our info post here 

Happy claiming!

summary: i was hoping "maybe today is the day" cause i am impatient and also i had ~vibes. they were correct! my phan sketchbook from...
body:
i was hoping “maybe today is the day” cause i am impatient and also i had ~vibes. they were correct! my phan sketchbook from @incaseyouart arrived and it is so very very lovely ugh ✨ also my beeb has to inspect everything that comes to the house and she is happy to have a new envelope to lie on.

i just really love fan art, if u couldn’t tell from this blog, and all the people who make it. i need to get back into doing it more myself.

i believe she still has some of the books to buy if u didn’t get chance on her kickstarter and i def recommend 10/10

blog.name: adorkablephil
blog.title: A Dork Like Phil
blog.description:
Kimberly
she/her/cis/ace/INFJ/48
I write stuff
adorkablephil on AO3

title: Phanfictionawards
body:
So @phanfictionawards is taking nominations for fics started in 2018, and so I thought I’d just remind people of some of the fics I wrote in 2018 that got the most attention, just in case you want to nominate something I’ve written.

The Roles We Play: (AU) slow burn romance set in the late 1930s (not yet finished)
Also on AO3 here

Phil’s Fantasy Comes True: pain kink, size kink, kink kink kink, I mean serious kink (I’m embarrassed to even include this one, but it did get a lot of attention.)
Also on AO3 here

How To Be A Sexy Nerd: much less kinky smut
Also on AO3 here

Tight Places: sexting during the ii tour smut
Also on AO3 here

The Body Electric: (AU) human Phil falls in love with an A.I. virus named Dan
Also on AO3 here

Hide Not Your Face: (AU) angsty slow burn sort of twist on Jekyll & Hyde
Also on AO3 here

I also wrote various short fluff fics that I’m not listing here because I’m not sure which ones people might have particularly liked. If you go here on AO3, you can see all of my fics in chronological order, and therefore see which ones were posted in 2018 (sadly, “Imaginary Friends” was started in October 2017 so you can’t nominate that one).

blog.name: pulp-phiction
blog.title: Fueling My Phantasies
blog.description: Hi! I’m Sam and I like to draw. It’s mostly fanart here, but I do draw original stuff. (Phanart, Star Wars, Original, etc.)

summary: Here’s Punk!Phil with a tongue piercing as part of my collab with @randomfandomginger ! She’s wrote a phanfic called Rose Gold...
caption: Here’s Punk!Phil with a tongue piercing as part of my collab with @randomfandomginger ! She’s wrote a phanfic called Rose Gold where Pastel!Dan wants to get his tongue pierced so Punk!Phil goes along with him. I really enjoyed reading it and I’m sure you will too! I was very much inspired by @julia-kisteneva ‘s art of Phil with a tongue piercing, so the whole idea is very much theirs.

reblog.comment: Here’s Punk!Phil with a tongue piercing as part of my collab with @randomfandomginger ! She’s wrote a phanfic called Rose Gold where Pastel!Dan wants to get his tongue pierced so Punk!Phil goes along with him. I really enjoyed reading it and I’m sure you will too! summary: Pastel-Punk Phan Oneshots - Random_Inked_Thoughts - Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Pastel-Punk Phan Oneshots - Random_Inked_Thoughts - Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Enjoy Pastel Dan and Punk Phil, or even Punk Dan and Pastel Phil? Check out what I have done so far in this small series of Pastel Punk Oneshots! 

2,633 words so far with only two of the works complete. Keep tuned for part three!

This is my part of a collaboration with the wonderful @pulp-phiction, who will be doodling these beautiful boys, so stay on the lookout for her works as well!

summary: I joked about not getting dog hats and we're getting fucking dog hats hell yeah
question: I joked about not getting dog hats and we're getting fucking dog hats hell yeah
answer: Dog hats for sure, but I’m having trouble figuring out the rest. I’m thinking Phil is putting out new socks, Dan appears to be doing some kind of jewelry(?) but the rest idk. That thing with the sharpie? Is it a poster? What that be? That black thing with the U on it? A mystery?
